name: Castle Ravenloft
description: Castle Ravenloft *(RAY-ven-loft)* is the heart of the domain of **Barovia** and the home of the vampire **Strahd von Zarovich**. *Ravenloft* is also one of the most famous dungeon adventures in the history of the D&D game, providing a horror-themed experience that inspired the creation of the Ravenloft setting and the adventure *Curse of Strahd*.
